column2: superQ5, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My dermatologist prescribed me this drug and in a few days i felt and see the difference.My stubord acne calm down and it dries up fast. smoothly going away from 7 days. IM starting to love my skin again. thumbs up!

column2: KimCam, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have only been using this acanya for a week, but I have already noticed a huge difference. Even after the first use, I noticed that my skin feels softer. The third day I had a little itching, but nothing major and that has calmed down. I do notice some peeling in the morning when I am putting on makeup, but if I wait about 20 minutes after applying it to put on makeup the peeling is decreased. I am very pleased so far! I have tried multiple things and this is the best yet. I am also on differin at night. My acne strikes around my chin and mouth and it is always in line with my cycle. I can't wait to see what a month of use will do!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Used product and had little irritation. Irritation went away and so did my acne, a few pimples remained, but huge difference. Out of nowhere, I woke up with an inflamed face that is red, itchy, and patchy as if I am sunburned. Skin feels rough to the touch. I've stopped using and will need to go back to demo to find out what else I can use.

column2: CandiceF, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I used this for two days, had a reaction were my face turned red and itched like a bad sunburn. Dermatologist told me to stop using, when I discontinued use the burning and itching went away. Going back to the dermatologist to get another prescription.

column2: happy mom, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: my 14 yo son was put on acanya and epiduo by his derm. After 3 months of use he has baby skin.  He wears sunblock and a moisturizer every day.  A little dry skin and irritation at first.  But well worth it!  Love this product and my derm for helping him with his acne.  Now my 11yo old has also been prescribed the same treatment.  Will not use anything else, after seeing such great results. Don't be afraid and use it. It is worth every dime. I recommend this product 100%

column2: Arr73, 7-12 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My 12 year old daughter has cystic acne on her forehead and along her t-zone....she was prescribed this along with two months of Solodyn (oral antibiotic). She also uses CeraVe cleanser. It's been about two weeks and the acne on her forehead is almost gone and with very little drying....and no side effects. We're pleased so far.

column2: Slml1013, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I've been using this product for about 2 years and couldn't be happier.  My doctor also has me using Tazorac at night as well.

column2: AP, 13-18 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: ATER GETTING RID OF MY BAD ACNE WITH ANTIBIOTIC PILLS MY DOC TOOK ME OFF THEM AND PRESCRIBED TOPICAL ACANYA TO CLEAR UP A FEW LINGERING PIMPLES.I HAVE BEEN USING ACANYA OVER 3 MONTHS.IT MADE MY ACNE FLARE UP BAD ALL OVER MY FACE AGAIN. I STUCK WITH IT HOPING IT WOULD GET BETTER.I STOPPED A WEEK AGO AND MY INFLAMED FACE HAS CALMED DOWN AND CLUSTERS OF DRULING ACNE DRIED UP.I'M GOING TO MY DERMOTOLOGIST TOMMOROW TO INFORM HIM ON WHAT HAPPENED.HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE FOR ME.

column2: hl, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have suffered from acne all of my life.  I've tried every drug, surgery, peel, spa treatment and while some provided some relief, nothing worked for very long.  Acanya is amazing.  I've been using it for almost a year.  After I wash my face (twice a day) I apply it all over my face and follow up with a mositurizer.  No more face covered in zits!.  When I feel a breakout coming, I apply extra on that spot and within 2 days it's gone.  It's pricey, but worth it.

column2: Alabama, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have "sandpaper" acne, which is basically minor pimples but a lot of rough skin with small pimples that are barely visible to the eye (it feel like sand paper when you touch it). I have used acanya TWICE along with atralin, perscribed by my dermatologist. I am having a severe burning reaction to acanya. It has made my face red and seem like a really bad sun burn. I also cant put anything else on my face (like lotion, to calm the burning or peeling) because it burns 10x worse. On a scale of one to ten (ten being the worst) my pain level is and 8. Its an 11 if lotion gets on it or after washing my face. I have stopped use of both acanya and atralin and have contacted my dermatologist. Hopefully the symptoms i have will calm before I can get in monday.

column2: choppo05, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: all other topical treatments have burned, dryed, and irritated my skin only making my acne worse. this is my third week of use and havent had any cystic acne since just minor clogged poors and blackheads. satisfied so far

column2: nikki, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: i have mild acne and decided to visit the dermatologist. she prescibed acanya which i noticed a difference on my skin in a couple of days. it cleared the breakouts fast, and my skin looks TOTALLY different. its been 1 week so far, and my skin is a beauty. Can't wait until 12 weeks. she also precribed retin a at night. SO FAR ITS A BEAUTY.should have went to the doctor sooner.  good luck

column2: kittarn, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: My dermatologist thought I needed prescription medication for moderate acne.  She gave me a sample of Acanya Gel.  She warned me it would be expensive but said it would work well.  She was right on both accounts.  My skin is beautiful-my friends and coworkers always comment on how clear it is.  It is a little pricey but I am willing to pay for the results.  I only have to get a refill every two months and only then because it expires after two months and it does quit working.  The only thing I would change would be for it to come in a smaller container since I always have leftovers when it expires.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I've only been using this for a week and I see significant results already. I haven't had a new breakout and most of the old acne is already gone. I have moderate to severe acne and have been trying to treat it for years and this is the one thing that has really seemed to work!

column2: Lauren, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This topical gel worked well for my skin, HOWEVER, I ended up getting SEVERE abdominal cramps and bowel movements, which I later found out was colitis, a side effect of the drug. I wish my Dr. would have told me to look out for this, as I thought it was the stomach flu!  Now I might need to undergo treatments for colitis.

column2: DBerry, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Acanya seemed to make my acne worse.  I kept trying to hang in there and not quit taking the medicine, but being 30 years of age, I am so frustrated with such medicines not working.  I've even used Accutane and my acne came back within 3 years. It seems the dermatologist just want to continue getting paid while I continue being frustrated!!

column2: TGTW, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Works great. I haven't had a breakout since about 2 weeks after use. This will bleach clothes. I am very pleased with teh results. I have tried tons of things and this has been the only thing that really worked.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Works wonders for me when other products have burned me or just failed. Severe acne, gone!

column2: 19-24 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Didn't work!

column2: tinkerbell, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had a severe allergic reaction to this drug.  Face was severely swollen, hot, red, blistered and required Steroids to treat it.

column2: brit, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have been using this product for 2 weeks now and have seen a huge improvement of my skin.
